IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: To enhance the operations, programs, and services of it's member health-related charities through access to workplace giving and to provide employees at work sites access to the full range of information, services, and referrals provided by member charities.
IRS990.MissionDescription: To enhance the operations, programs, and services of it's member health-related charities through access to workplace giving and to provide employees at work sites access to the full range of information, services, and referrals provided by member charities.
IRS990.Description: COLLECTION AND DISTRIBUTION OF PROCEEDS OF COMBINED FEDERAL CAMPAIGN AND OTHER CAMPAIGNS TO MEMBER AGENCIES.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DISCLOSURE OF GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD REVIEWS OFFICER COMPENSATION ANNUALLY AND MAKES A DETERMINATION BASED ON ALL RELAVENT FACTORS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: NO DIRECTOR OF OFFICER OF CHC SHALL ENGAGE IN ANY COURSE OF CONDUCT THAT MAY RESULT IN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST WITH CHC, OR TAKE ANY PUBLIC POSITION INIMICAL TO THE BEST INTERESTS OF CHC, OR IT'S MEMBERS, WITHOUT THE APPROVAL OF THE CHC BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND DIRECTOR REVIEWS THE FORM 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED
